Annotate Functions

run_annotation()
Add Gene Annotations

Gene Conversion

convert_human_to_mouse()
Convert human gene symbols to mouse gene symbols
convert_mouse_to_human()
Convert mouse gene symbols to human gene symbols
convert_orthologs_df()
Convert orthologs between human and mouse for a data frame
convert_orthologs_matrix()
Convert orthologs between human and mouse for an gene expression matrix
convert_orthologs_vector()
Convert orthologs between human and mouse for a vector of genes

Find Genes

Get genes from mitochondrial chromosome
get_str_genes()
Get genes matching specific patterns

Get genes from X and Y chromosomes
bcr.string
Regular expression pattern for BCR genes
hb.string
Regular expression pattern for hemoglobin genes
mhc.string
Regular expression pattern for MHC genes
mt.string
Regular expression pattern for mitochondrial genes
rb.string
Regular expression pattern for ribosomal genes
tcr.string
Regular expression pattern for TCR genes
